item.title: Do You Want Linux News Log Podcasts Daily?
item.dc:creator: Adrian Bacon
item.description:
Hi,

This is Adrian, host of Linux News Log, and I’m wondering if you, the listener and visitor of the site would like to have daily podcasts from here.

Please respond by either commenting here on the site for this post, or by sending me an email at linux at quicksurf.com.

One of the problems I’ve been having with getting the shows out on time is how much time it takes me to gather the news, but if I do it every day, I could get the show out in pretty short order, and the shows would all be a lot shorter and easier to listen to.

Let me know.

Adrian.
